body.name: Calphalon 1934150 Classic Nonstick Omelet Fry Pan, 10", Grey
body.stockDetail: Only 1 left in stock - order soon.
features: Dual-layer nonstick for easy food release and quick cleanup
Cast stay-cool stainless steel long handle
body.description: The Calphalon Classic Nonstick 10-Inch Fry Pan is made with dual-layer nonstick for extra-easy food release and cleanup and constructed from durable hard-anodized aluminum for fast and even heating. The long stainless steel handle feels comfortable in your hand and stays cool on the stovetop. Gently sloped sides and flared edges make this medium non stick frying pan ideal for preparing eggs, omelets and other delicate foods.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At a Glance: Durable 10-inch fry pan Gently sloped sides and flared edges Dual-layer nonstick interior Hard-anodized aluminum for even heating Long, stay-cool stainless steel handle Oven safe to 450 degrees Fahrenheit Calphalon Classic Nonstick 10-inch Fry Pan Designed for reliable everyday cooking, the Calphalon Classic Nonstick 10-inch Fry Pan is constructed from durable hard-anodized aluminum for fast and even heating, with a dual-layer nonstick interior for extra-easy food release and cleanup. This fry pan features gently sloping sides with flared edges, making it ideal for preparing eggs and omelettes, sautéing vegetables, and cooking other delicate foods. The Calphalon Classic Nonstick 10-inch Fry Pan is oven safe up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit and backed by a full lifetime warranty*. *For more information you can contact the official customer service or visit the official website.

Versatile Fry Pan for Reliable Everyday Cooking This 10-inch pan features gently sloping sides with flared edges, making it ideal for frying. Use the Calphalon Classic Nonstick 10-inch Fry Pan to prepare frittatas and scrambles, sear chops, or cook asparagus and eggplant. Dual-Layer Nonstick for Easy Release and Cleanup This pan features a dual-layer nonstick interior, allowing food to release with ease and offering quick cleanup when the meal is finished. Hard-Anodized Aluminum for Even Heating Constructed from durable hard-anodized aluminum, the Calphalon Classic Nonstick 10-inch Fry Pan is designed to stand up to daily use and offers fast and consistent heating. A long, cast stainless steel handle stays cool on the stovetop for comfortable handling.

Full Lifetime Warranty* This product is backed by a full lifetime warranty. Calphalon will replace any item found defective in material or workmanship when put to normal household use and cared for according to the instructions. To register your products, visit the official website. Oven Safe for Versatility in the Kitchen You can use the Calphalon Classic Nonstick 10-inch Fry Pan in the oven at temperatures up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit, allowing you to move it effortlessly from the stovetop for frying to the oven for baking. This fry pan is intended for gas, electric, electric ring, halogen, and glass stovetops, and should be used with nylon, coated, or wooden utensils to protect the nonstick surface from damage.
Add Classic Style to Your Kitchen With its timeless design, this fry pan lends a traditional aesthetic to your kitchen.

How to Cook with Nonstick? - Never use cooking spray. Aerosol cooking spray leaves a gummy residue that is difficult to remove, and that residue will cause food to stick. Instead, use an oil mister filled with olive or vegetable oil, or dab a bit of oil on a paper towel and carefully wipe the interior of the pan. - Use the correct heat setting. Use low heat for warming, simmering and preparing sauces; use medium heat for frying, grilling, sautéing, searing or stir-frying; use high heat for boiling or reducing liquids. - Preheat the pan. Nonstick cookware can take a minute or two longer to preheat compared to aluminum or stainless steel cookware. For best results, make sure your nonstick pan is heated to the proper temperature before adding food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The 10" omelet fry pan was the perfect size for many uses, not just omelets. I have used Calphalon cookware for many years. Food cooks evenly and does not stick. I always add a little olive oil for flavor.I highly recommend this product. It is a perfect addition to one's cookware!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed to replace an old version since the bottom was flaking off. LOVE this pan. Food slides right out of the pan and super easy clean up. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars not my new favorite
reviews.reviewText: The size and contours of the pan are fine for omelets - smoothly sloping sides and capacity for a 2 or 3 egg omelet. The finish seems fine. This is the "Classic" line which might mean it is less sturdy than similar "restaurant quality" pans. The weight is noticeably less than some pans and the handle is way to short. That may be because of not wanting to overbalance the weight of the handle relative to the weight of the pan, but it makes it difficult for me to grip the handle without getting my hand uncomfortably close to the heated pan. All that said, it made a good omelet, first try, no pan seasoning needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this pan. I have a same brand etc but smaller that I always use so I wanted a larger one. Live the size. Not too big or small... Just right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: One of the best cookware companies out there

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CalPhalanx fry pan
reviews.reviewText: I had one previous and like so much I ordered a new since I burned it because I have a new stove and didn’t watch it closely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: Was the one essential piece missing from the set I bought a year ago.

reviews.reviewTitle: happy with this non stick pan
reviews.reviewText: happy with the performance of this pan, it has been a versatile addition to our kitchen. The pan is light, which took a bit of getting used to as we are used to heavier pans, but now that accustomed it is a non-issue.

I bought this to replace my old one which lasted 12+ years and finally was looking worse for wear. I love cast iron cookware but find them too heavy for casual use most of the time (esp in a small kitchen), yet the $20-30 range pans typically stocked in every store are too flimsy and insubstantial. This is a great weight, handle feels great, and really holds up. For the size and weight, this is my perfect workhorse for a single serve meal-in-a-pan, a saute prep pan, or a quick fry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 9, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful pan, excellent to cook with.

reviews.reviewTitle: la guyarantie est tel que promis

reviews.reviewText: Not as in the picture, no hand handle, just handle... cooks well, nice style appears to be durable
